fields.recipe: Whisk three eggs with two tablespoons of cream and cook them on low heat on well-buttered pan
fields.dish_description: A nice way to cheer you up in the morning or any other part of your day!

fields.recipe: boil the whole chicken with two carrots, one onion and some parsley on low heat for at least two hours
fields.dish_description: The soup of all soups. Great for those cold rainy days or just any days to be honest!

fields.recipe: grill your preffered cut of beef on high heat for three minutes per side and then leave it for at least three minutes to rest with a tablespoon of butter and some rosemary
fields.dish_description: The most basic yet delicious thing to do with beef

fields.recipe: Boil spagetti according to recommendations on the packaging. Then drain it and serve with some butter, grated garlic and some tomatoes
fields.dish_description: The dish that will take your mind to the South of Italy and will make you feel greater than ever!

fields.recipe: Crack two eggs on well-buttered pan and fry them until whites are fully cooked and yolks are still runny
fields.dish_description: The easiest meal ever! Everyone can do it, but here is the right way to do so
